localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: No more messy bookmarks. No more missing out. Dev Resources has everything a developer needs, presented in curated lists. Improve your skill set, find assets, discover your next favourite tool and get great discounts on digital products â€” all in one place.
nodes.title: Dev Resources - Collaborative list of resources for developers

nodes.excerpt: Robot coffee shop using off-the-shelf equipment to customize their menu faster and offer a large variety of drinks at a lower price than other robot coffee shops.
nodes.title: Robo Esso - Automated coffee shop using off-the-shelf hardware
nodes.author: Freeman LaFleur

nodes.excerpt: Switch off. Slow down. Sundayy is the mindfulness based social network designed to be checked just once a week. Sundayy represents spending time away from feeds, thinking deeper about our days, and sharing what matters with the people who matter.
nodes.title: Sundayy - The social network you check once a week, on Sunday.
nodes.author: Jillian Schuller

nodes.excerpt: Join us for weekly fireside chats with iconic product leaders: Feb 4: Manik Gupta, former CPO at Uber and product leader at Google Maps Feb 11: Jiaona Zhang, VP of Product at Webflow Feb 18: Sriram Krishnan, previously at Snap, Twitter, and Facebook
nodes.title: UserLeap: The Biggest Launch Series - Learn what makes or breaks a successful product launch

nodes.excerpt: Nwcode - is a no-code platform for building powerful web and mobile apps, that can include payments, notifications, and more. Integration with Woocommerce, Shopify in two clicks
nodes.title: Nwicode - Build apps for every platform, without code âœ¨

nodes.excerpt: DuoQi is a 65W Gallium Nitride (GaN) charger which integrates a foldable 15W double-sided wireless charging pad, a USB-A 3.0 and a Type-C PD charging port.
nodes.title: DuoQi - The 1st 65W GaN Charger w/ Wireless Charging Pad

nodes.excerpt: Create and share internal company podcasts to keep employees in tune with whatâ€™s important. For example: easily record a weekly update and send it in a push notification, so your team can listen just like their favorite podcasts.

nodes.excerpt: Signing bad contracts is the worst. TermScout uses NLP + human attorneys to analyze more than 600 data points in common SaaS agreements and rates them based on customer favorability. Less negotiating, less legal, less confusion. Stop signing bad contracts!
nodes.title: TermScout - Free reviews and ratings on top SaaS contracts

nodes.excerpt: Bunnyshell is a self-service DevOps automation platform that helps teams cut downtime and deliver reliable applications and services at high velocity.
nodes.title: Bunnyshell - Self-service DevOps automation for any application
nodes.author: Alin Dobra

nodes.excerpt: Data tables are all over the internet, especially Wikipedia. sqanything lets you query the HTML tables in all your open Chrome tabs with SQL. You can send the results of your query to Google Sheets or just send all the tables on a web page to Google Sheets.
nodes.title: sqanything - Query any data tables on the Web with SQL

nodes.title: Millions - Follow @Millions. Match 6 #s. Win our VC's money.

nodes.excerpt: The Real-time WallStreetBets sentiment tracker measures the sentiment in the reddit forum. They also track WSB market sentiment relative to market (SPY) and have a WallStreetBets Index to monitor intraday price action of popular stocks that are discussed
nodes.title: r/WallStreetBets Sentiment Analysis -  Measure sentiment on the popular reddit forum

nodes.title: Kumu - Beautifully organize complex data into relationship maps

nodes.excerpt: An interactive space that shows how product management best practices work, including working examples of OKRs, outcome-based roadmaps, along with real examples of ideas, experiments, and customer feedback. Add, delete, and move items around as if you were using the tool to manage your own products.

nodes.title: Video Party - Watch videos together

nodes.excerpt: Rysolv provides a platform for users to share issues, contribute to open source, and get paid for their work. ğŸ’¸ Anyone can create an issue or contribute towards a bounty. Whoever submits a solution closing out the issue earns the bounty.
nodes.title: rysolv - Fix open source issues, get paid
